alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:19PM CDT until May 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Webster County in south central Nebraska... Adams County in south central Nebraska... East central Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bladen to near Cowles to near Red Cloud, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Roseland, Holstein and Ayr around 425 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 430 PM CDT. Juniata and Rosemont around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hastings, Lawrence, Hansen, Fairfield, Glenvil, Trumbull, Inland and Deweese. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
